means: 以电话传送（消息），给（某人）打电话

sentence.Network_en: He will have been heartened by the telephone opinion poll published yesterday.
sentence.Network_cn: 他会为昨天公布的电话民意调查结果感到鼓舞。

sentence.Network_en: "I think I hear the telephone ringing."—"Okay, I can take a hint."
sentence.Network_cn: “我想我听到电话铃在响。”——“好的，我明白你的意思了。”

sentence.Network_en: The Chief Constable's clipped tones crackled over the telephone line.
sentence.Network_cn: 电话线那头噼里啪啦地传来警察局长短促的声音。

encyclopedia.content: 电话是通过电信号双向传输话音的设备。通常人们将亚历山大·格拉汉姆·贝尔(Alexander Graham Bell）认为是电话的发明者。美国国会2002年6月15日269号决议确认安东尼奥·穆齐（Antonio Meucci ）为电话的发明人。穆齐于1860年首次向公众展示了他的发明，并在纽约的意大利语报纸上发表了关于这项发明的介绍。 另有一首同名歌曲。

entry.def: The telephone is the electrical system of communication that you use to talk directly to someone else in a different place. You use the telephone by dialling a number on a piece of equipment and speaking into it.

example.ex: They usually exchanged messages by telephone...
example.tran: 他们一般通过电话互通消息。

example.ex: I dread to think what our telephone bill is going to be...
example.tran: 我不敢想象我们的电话费会有多少。

entry.def: A telephone is the piece of equipment that you use when you talk to someone by telephone.

example.ex: He got up and answered the telephone...
The telephone in Rizzoli's room rang.
example.tran: 里佐利房间的电话响了。

entry.def: If you telephone someone, you dial their telephone number and speak to them by telephone.

example.ex: I felt so badly I had to telephone Owen to say I was sorry...
example.tran: 我心里实在难受，觉得必须给欧文打电话道个歉。

example.ex: They usually telephone first to see if she is at home.
example.tran: 他们通常先打个电话，看看她在不在家。

entry.def: If you are on the telephone, you are speaking to someone by telephone.

example.ex: Linda remained on the telephone to the police for three hours...
example.tran: 琳达在电话里和警察谈了 3 个小时。

example.ex: We talked on the telephone for quite a while.
example.tran: 我们在电话里谈了好一阵子。

entry.def: To be on the telephone means to have a telephone in your house or office which is connected to the rest of the telephone system.

example.ex: Are you on the telephone at home?

means.word_mean: 1. electronic equipment that converts sound into electrical signals that can be transmitted over distances and then converts received signals back into sounds;

sentences.sentence: "I talked to him on the telephone"

means.word_mean: 1. get or try to get into communication (with someone) by telephone;

sentences.sentence: "I tried to call you all night"
"Take two aspirin and call me in the morning"

auth_sentence.content: But he was informed of the searches by telephone.
auth_sentence.res_content: But he was informed of the searches by telephone.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But he was informed of the searches by telephone.

auth_sentence.content: Then the telephone went out, then the electricity.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then the telephone went out, then the electricity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then the telephone went out, then the electricity.

auth_sentence.content: The exchange occurred during a telephone call Tuesday morning.
auth_sentence.res_content: The exchange occurred during a telephone call Tuesday morning.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The exchange occurred during a telephone call Tuesday morning.

stems_affixes.type_exp: =far,表示"远[引申为电,电从远方来]"

stems_affixes.word_buile: tele远[引申为电,电从远方来]+gram写,画→n.电报
tele远[引申为电,电从远方来]+graph写→用电写→电报
tele远[引申为电,电从远方来]+meter测量→远测量→遥测仪
tele远[引申为电,电从远方来]+phone声音,话机→n.电话,电话机 v.打电话
tele远[引申为电,电从远方来]+scope看→看远方→望远镜
tele远[引申为电,电从远方来]+vis看+ion表名词→看远方,通过电视看→电视
tele远[引申为电,电从远方来]+graph写→用电写→电报
tele远[引申为电,电从远方来]+phone声音,话机→n.电话,电话机 v.打电话
tele远[引申为电,电从远方来]+scope看→看远方→望远镜
tele远[引申为电,电从远方来]+vis看+e→看远方,通过电视等看

Sentence.sentence: He ran home and telephoned the city police to say that his car had been stolen.
The new CNS Spectrums study was based on results of a nationwide telephone survey of more than 2,500 adults.
The official unemployment rate is the product of a telephone survey of about 60000 homes.
My telephone was disconnected by the phone company.
He sounded good on the telephone.

sentences.en: The doctor was in touch by telephone with his patients.
sentences.cn: 医生通过电话与病人保持联系。

sentences.en: There are three telephones on his desk.

means.word_mean: 以电话传送(消息), 给(某人)打电话

sentences.en: She has telephoned for the doctor.
sentences.cn: 她已经打了电话给医生。

sentences.en: Don't telephone me when I am busy.
sentences.cn: 在我忙的时候不要打电话给我。

jushi.english: I told him through the telephone.
I put the telephone down and took up my work again.
jushi.chinese: 我放下电话继续干我的活。

jushi.english: Now that my mother has a telephone, it's much easier to get in touch with her.
jushi.chinese: 因为我母亲有电话,所以与她联系方便得多。
